title: [Large-Scale] Exploring the Ethical Foundations of Machine Learning Algorithms: Ethical Analysis of Datasets and Learning Procedures

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Programming and Machine Learning Concepts Understanding with Foundational Data Analysis Skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments using digital tools, with project-based integration of experimental data and real-world case studies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze bias in datasets used for machine learning model training across three dimensions: problem definition, data collection, and labeling.
Learners can evaluate ethical dilemmas arising in specific machine learning projects using the 'genuine options' framework.
Learners can design an evaluation system incorporating moral considerations during the model training process using real-world datasets.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
